page.title: 12A DAY IN MAM AN DADS LIFE
page.content: At aboot siven o'clock the cock wakens me up an'I gyang doon the stairs for ma brakfist.Dad his hid his tae an' toast aready an ' he taks the milk jug doon and the tub for the cream.Then he gyangs oot tae see the coos.He gaes Granny the milk an'Mam gyangs doon for't efter.Dad taks the loader and dis the beasts. He gaes them their neeps. David comes an' helps tae mix the barley wi'the sugar beet. They get silage an'hay.Then Dad his his denner an' gyangs oot tae work on the truck. He sometimes his tae tak Mam tae the shops tae buy things to go on the loaf.Then he'll hae his tae an'efter his jobs are daen he watches T.V wi Mam. Mam dis her jobs. She dis the big things on Monday an'looks efter Jill.She cleans up ,maks the beds an'dis the bakin.
